name: Airport Bingo!
description:
Frequent Flyers: turn your travel adventures into a reality game: Airport Bingo!

Complete a Bingo card of the airports you've traveled. This GPS-enabled app "checks you in" when you land at a major U.S. airport in your quest of scoring an Airport Bingo.

Play one or more bingo cards for:
- Largest U.S. Airports
- Major U.S. Airports
- Eastern U.S. Airports
- Central U.S. Airports
- Western U.S. Airports
- International Airports
